pages.title: Semi-permeable Glass
pages.text: $(italic)Those annoying monsters that always appear at night! For a long time now, they are no longer a threat to you and only serve as a resource supplier, if at all. But that doesn't stop them from pursuing you further. There you remember back to your attempts with the gemstone glass. Surely this one - with a touch of magic - can hold back not only wind.$()

Semi-permeable Glass comes in all the colors of minerals that are available to you, including the common glass and it's tinted variant.$(br2)It looks exactly like it's $(l:decoration/gemstone_glass)boring counterpart$(), but has the special property that players can pass through it without any problems, while all other creatures bounce off it like a fly off a window.
